{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19976v1", "title": "Formation of trapped surfaces for the Einstein--Maxwell--charged scalar
  field system", "summary": "In this paper, we prove a scale-critical trapped surface formation result for
the Einstein--Maxwell--charged scalar field (EMCSF) system, without any
symmetry assumptions. Specifically, we establish a scale-critical semi-global
existence theorem from past null infinity and show that the focusing of
gravitational waves, the concentration of electromagnetic fields, or the
condensation of complex scalar fields, each individually, can lead to the
formation of a trapped surface. In addition, we capture a nontrivial charging
process along past null infinity, which introduces new difficulties due to the
abnormal behavior of the matter fields. Nevertheless, the semi-global existence
result and the formation of a trapped surface remain valid.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP,gr-qc,math.DG", "published": "2025-04-28T16:49:11Z"}
